forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 8C. WSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 46F. WSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 11C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 52F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
